head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DESAUSSURE, WILLIAM P. III.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DESAUSSURE, WILLIAM P. III.

block.p: DeSAUSSURE-William P. III. Of Englewood and Mantoloking, NJ, Thursday, August 10, 2000. Born 1909, Halifax, VA. Graduate Loomis and Virginia Military Institute. Retired DeSaussure Equipment Co., Inc., Maywood, NJ. Predeceased by Mary A. DeSaussure 1988. Surviving are: W.P. DeSaussure IV (Joyce) of Closter, NJ, Nina D. Frederick (Robert) of Columbus, OH, Lily and Jack DeSaussure, Robert Flowers (Jeanne), William Frederick and great-granddaughter Ellen Flowers. In lieu of flowers, please consider donating to a charity of your choice.
